effect.sun_moon: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.
